extendedInfo.description: WO Webcam can turn your Android phone into PC webcam.Main features- Provide video streaming for messegners (Skype/MSN Live/GTalk/...) or recording tools- Connection can be over Bluetooth, USB or WiFi- Support different video resolutions (*Lite version only supports low resolution)- Support both back and front facing camera- Video can be flipped or rotatedPC side software is needed to make it work. Please visit support website for detailed installation and setup guide:http://www.wirelessorange.com/wowebcam/If you meet any problems, please drop us a mail. Buy its paid version ("WO Webcam") if you like this app.

reviews.title: Various modes of connectivity
reviews.comment: I tried various software to enable the use of android phone as a webcam but nearly all were very limited on connectivity options. This app has usb,bluetooth and wifi modes to connect. Works very well with my Xperia Mini Pro
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fantastic - Low resolution on free version
reviews.comment: Works fantastic over USB. This free version only gives a small resolution, but it\'s easy to set up, and it\'s the only app I\'ve used that actually works over USB with very little hassle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: pc client
reviews.comment: PC client crashes after some time and needs to be relaunched which is a bit annoying.

reviews.title: great app..
reviews.comment: Was Looking for an app for long, tried so many.... each got single feature, either USB or wifi or bluetooth...thanks to developer for embedding all features in single one...

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: I have the galaxy S4 and when i set the settings to high or medium the device shows a distorted bad picture please fix it
reviews.author: Jose Guzman

reviews.title: Wifi Streaming Webcam - It Works
reviews.comment: Seems to be impossible to configure android as a USB webcam. Oh well. This workaround also turns your phone into a video baby monitor, UStream camera, etc. Very good results on my cheap Huawei phone. It would be nice if you could set defaults, you have to turn on LED light/autofocus via remote every time. Warning: camera + streaming video + wifi + LED drains your battery FAST!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC sensation xl
reviews.comment: With win 7 , 64 bit works perfect for Skype. That\'s what I use .

reviews.title: Disapointment
reviews.comment: The Usb Connection is so poor. My Phone continued to say it couldn\'t connect to the camera. Worked once but never got it to be a web cam. this app is possibly the worse one i have ever wasted my time on. I give one star due to the fact that i can not give half to zero
